featured.text: Some researchers point out that as trees often grow close together, treetops can easily collide and break when swayed by the wind.

definition.zh_def: 搖擺；影響或改變（某人的意見或行為）。
definition.en_def: To move back and forth or side to side; to influence or change someone's opinion or behavior.
definition.example: The trees sway gently in the breeze.
